You know what you don't know, 

Or do you prefer to stay in the unknown? 

It's nice and comfy doing so, 

But is it any good for life we own? 

If you don't know what you don't know, 

How will you figure out it all? 

Since when you know what you don't know, 

Unknown becomes now known.
